hero.Hero welcome1: Hello, My Name is Ahmad Al Arif

about.About subject: Here is a brief overview of my background.
about.About description: Welcome to my web page! I am a full stack web developer with years of experience in creating engaging, dynamic web applications. I am passionate about building functional and user-friendly websites that exceed client expectations. My expertise lies in developing complex web applications using a wide range of front-end and back-end technologies. I have experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, among others. I thrive in challenging environments and enjoy working collaboratively with clients and other developers to create exceptional web solutions. My approach to web development is centered on the user experience. I believe that a website should be easy to navigate, visually appealing, and optimized for user engagement. I place great emphasis on designing responsive and mobile-friendly websites that perform well across all devices. In addition to my technical skills, I am a strong communicator who takes pride in delivering high-quality work on time and within budget. I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development, and I am always looking for ways to improve my skills and knowledge. Whether you need a simple website or a complex web application, I am confident that I have the skills and expertise to deliver a high-quality solution. If you are interested in working together, please do not hesitate to get in touch!

experience.Experience description: I accomplished 480 hours of face-to-face instruction, completion of course projects, and successful completion of capstone presentation. Project 1: Developed user interfaces with modern JavaScript libraries/frameworks HTML5, andCSS3, which significantly improved page performance. The project idea is to connect 4 same-color. challenges between two players.Project2 Created a static page using Ruby on Rails. The project is about a music album collection.Project 3: create a web page for Barbershop booking. The used technologies are React with Bootstrap for the front end and Ruby on Rails for the back end.Project 4: created a web page using (MERN Stack) MongoDB, AXIOS, AJAX, APIs, Node.js, and NPM as a Back-End, and React with Bootstrap For the Front End.

projects.Project-1 description: The objective of this system is to provide a convenient and efficient way for gym members to reserve spots in fitness classes offered at the gym. This system is enable members to easily browse through available classes and schedules, and make reservations for the classes they wish to attend.
projects.Project-2 description: The gym class booking system  allow gym administrators to manage class schedules, set class capacities, and track attendance. This system is providing real-time updates on class availability and allow for automated waitlist management.
projects.Project-3 description: The objective of this online food menu is to provide a user-friendly platform for customers to browse through available food options and place orders for delivery, takeout, or dine-in at a restaurant. The online food menu is offering an easy-to-use interface that is accessible through multiple devices, including desktop computers, tablets, and smartphones.
projects.Project-4 description: The objective of a Connect Four game is to provide an engaging and challenging game for players of all ages. The game is easy to learn, but provide enough strategy and depth to keep players engaged and coming back for more.
projects.Project-5 description: About Page with devise and devise active admin (Login system for user and admin)for AlRaedah Finance Company Using Ruby On Rails framework with Render for hosting and deployment
